[docs]def isnan(obj):
    """ Checking for nan
    
    the lack of a standard isnan function 
    that accepts an arbitrary type 
    (isnan(str) and isnan(float) are used here)
    """
    return obj != obj



[docs]def get_correct_answer(msg, ans_list):
    ans = 0
    while ans not in ans_list:
        ans = input(msg)
    return ans
